title: onprem
extract: (often abbreviated as on-prem software, and also called “on-premises” software) is installed and run on computers on the premises (in the building) of the person or organisation using the software, rather than at a remote facility, such as at a server farm or cloud somewhere on the internet.Jan 31, 2013
extract_html: (often abbreviated as on-prem software, and also called “on-premises” software) is installed and run on computers on the premises (in the building) of the person or organisation using the software, rather than at a remote facility, such as at a server farm or cloud somewhere on the internet.Jan 31, 2013
